top_questions.text: Study the given program and answer the questions that follow. [2] DECLARE FUNCTION Calculate (X,Y)​ CLS​ INPUT "Enter a multi-digit number"; N​ LET S = Calculate (N,T)​ PRINT "The sum ="; S​ END FUNCTION Calculate (X,Y)​ WHILE X < > 0​ R=X MOD 10​ Y = Y + R​ X=X\10​ WEND​ Calculate = Y​ END FUNCTION Questions:
Write a program in QBASIC to find out sum of three numbers using SUB procedure and average of three numbers using FUNCTION procedure. [4]
What is a global variable?​ f) Which mode is used to add data items into the already existed data file in QBASIC?
The process of making copies of data or data files to use in the event the original data or data files are lost or destroyed.
